alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bibb, Monroe, Upson, northwestern Crawford, west central Jones, northern Talbot and southeastern Lamar Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 647 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Dames Ferry to near Logtown to near Pine Mountain Valley, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Forsyth, Gray, Woodland, Yatesville, Culloden, Lincoln Park, Sunset Village, Bolingbroke, Dames Ferry, Redbone Crossroads, Russellville, Brent, Clinton, Musella, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Redbone, Pleasant Hill, Logtown and Arkwright. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Crawford; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Talbot; Upson
